description: The PAT_COB_INFO_EFF_GROUP_SZ table contains a list of Coordination of Benefits (COB) coverage effective period group sizes for a COB coverage to which a member belongs.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: COB_CVRD_THRU_EMPLOYER_SIZE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The covered through group size for this COB coverage.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


1-19 Employees


20-99 Employees


100+ Employees
